welcome_message_body: Welcome to Foshan, a city known for its rich history, traditional culture, and beautiful gardens. We hope you enjoy your time exploring the charm of our city and all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Summer House pizza bar
restaurants.description: Summer House pizza bar is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Paulaner Bräuhaus (宝莱纳餐厅)
restaurants.description: Paulaner Bräuhaus (宝莱纳餐厅) is a german restaurant located in 佛山市.

restaurants.name: 泰爱里泰国餐厅 Thai Alley
restaurants.description: 泰爱里泰国餐厅 Thai Alley is a thai restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Little Italy
restaurants.description: Little Italy is a italian restaurant located in 佛山市.

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut (必胜客)
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut (必胜客) is a pizzeria located in 佛山市.
restaurants.address: 季华路顺联国际购物广场二楼, 佛山市, 广东

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and/or have time limits.
